title: Quickview of the Platform
description: Video that shows some of the main features of the platform.
detailedDescription:
Video that shows some of the main features of the platform. 

[Watch video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V6MdKJJqXqw&feature=youtu.be)

##Features

- Ontologies y Templates GSMA
- Dataflows

- Planned tasks
